description:
Are you angry? I am. 6 months of losing friendships because of fearmongering. 6 months of lockdowns that have destroyed small businesses all across this country. 6 months of isolation. 6 months of my friends and family losing their jobs, the economy tanking — AND ALL FOR POLITICAL GAIN. Spread the word. It’s time to wake up. A virus with a 99.98% survival rate is absolutely a HOAX.

-

Follow @redpillfairy for more Right-wing news to combat the incessant and inescapable Leftist programming. This is war. 💊🇺🇸

#fearmongering #plandemic #coronavirus #walkaway
